cards.title: Impulse
powers: Draw a card, then discard a card. Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to {ImpulseCharacter}.
IncapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One hero may deal 1 target 2 melee damage.
Discard the top card of a deck.

openingLines.oblivaeon: Okay. Let's get serious. What would Grampa Barry do?

cards.title: Instinctive Vibration
body: Whenever {ImpulseCharacter} is dealt damage, prevent all damage that would be dealt to {ImpulseCharacter} until the end of the current turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't get it!{BR}We had him point blank!

cards.title: Zero Attention Span
body: At the end of your turn, you may destroy an Ongoing card. If you don't, {ImpulseCharacter} deals himself 1 energy damage.
At the start of your turn, you may draw a card or play a card.

cards.title: Crossfire
body: Whenever damage that would be dealt to {ImpulseCharacter} is prevented or reduced to 0 or less, the source of that damage deals 1 non-{ImpulseCharacter} target 1 damage of that type.
powers: Choose a target. Prevent the next damage that target would deal to {ImpulseCharacter}. Draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: To a boy who can race the wind{BR}and vibrate through solid objects, danger{BR}is always someone else's problem.

cards.title: You Dropped This!
body: When damage that would be dealt to a hero target is prevented or reduced to 0 or less, put a token on this card.
powers: Remove X tokens from this card. If you do, {ImpulseCharacter} deals 1 target X irreducible melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Anybody home? No?{BR}Well, here's your bullets back!

cards.title: Air Pocket
body: When this card enters play, move it next to a target. When that target would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, you may draw a card or use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: So, how'd you rocket off{BR}a cliff and not trash your dad's wheels,{BR}Danger Dan?

cards.title: Inside Scoop
body: When a card is destroyed, you may reveal the top card of its deck, then replace it.

flavorQuotes.text: M-M-Max... We've got a problem here...!

cards.title: Reaction Time
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card.
When a villain One-Shot or a non-target environment card would enter play, you may discard it instead. If you do, destroy this card and {ImpulseCharacter} deals himself 2 melee and 2 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: What happened?!?{BR}I coulda sworn I was falling...

cards.title: Slipstream Arsenal
body: Whenever a non-hero card is destroyed by a hero card, you may put it under this card.
At the start of your turn, discard 3 cards from under this card. {ImpulseCharacter} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage for each card discarded this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Speedsters occasionally make{BR}sudden 90-degree turns. Rocks don't.

cards.title: Enrage and Evade
body: {ImpulseCharacter} deals 1 target 1 sonic damage.
The next time that target would deal damage, prevent that damage and you may destroy an environment card.

cards.title: Shortcut
body: Draw 2 cards.
Search a deck for a card. Discard that card. Shuffle that deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I just looked under [b]every[/b]{BR}porch in town until I found it.

cards.title: Impulse-Sitting
body: One player, other than you, may play a card or use a power.
If another player played a card this turn, prevent the next damage dealt to a hero target. If another hero used a power this turn, you may play an Ongoing card.
If neither happened, {ImpulseCharacter} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each.

cards.title: Flash of Inspiration
body: {ImpulseCharacter} deals 1 target 1 lightning damage. You may draw a card.
You may discard a card. If you don't, {ImpulseCharacter} deals himself 1 lightning damage.
One player may play a card.

cards.title: Hyper-Retention
body: Up to 2 other players may each return a card from their trash to their hand.
You may draw a card or play an Ongoing card. If you played a card this way, {ImpulseCharacter} deals himself 2 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: All I need to do is set up{BR}this stuff the way Dr. Morlo had it...

cards.title: Leap into Action
body: {ImpulseCharacter} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target would deal damage, reduce that damage to 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Uh. Hi. This is all a really big mistake...

cards.title: Whirlwind Express
body: Draw a card.
Select a target. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 and increase damage dealt to that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: There's your 'teamwork',{BR}Wonder Boy- what'd ya think of that?!

promoCards.title: Impulse
powers: Reveal the top card of a deck. Replace or discard it.
IncapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Increase the next damage dealt by that target by 2.
Put a card from a trash on the bottom of its deck.
One hero may use a power now.

openingLines.default: Wow, if only we had someone who could tell us your whole plan and how to beat you... oh, right!
openingLines.oblivaeon: If I can't find the future, we'll have to make one.

promoCards.title: Impulse
powers: Discard a card. If you do, {ImpulseCharacter} deals 1 target 3 infernal damage.

openingLines.default: My magic can take care of this! No sweat!
openingLines.oblivaeon: I already fixed everything! I saved everyone! You're not taking that from me!

promoCards.title: Impulse
powers: The next time another hero would be dealt damage, redirect it to {ImpulseCharacter}. If {ImpulseCharacter} takes damage this way, he regains 2 HP.
IncapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
One player draws 2 cards, then discards a card.

openingLines.default: Mark Twain said, Always do right. This will gratify some people, and astonish the rest.
openingLines.oblivaeon: You've only got one trick. I'm not scared of you.
